short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add FFZ custom badges outside of the FFZ plug-in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on will allow custom FFZ badges to be displayed for users, on Twitch, who do not have FFZ installed. There has been a shift towards 7TV but their add-on does not support the FFZ custom badges. This add-on will check whether the streamer you are watching has custom moderator and VIP badges uploaded to FFZ and then replace the badges in chat.

If you favourite streamer has custom FFZ badges then these should be replaced in chat, in the user list and in VODs
